posts.postText: A free to play mmo thrid person shooter with rpg elements that is set in the future; Global Agenda is a game I truly love. However, I know no one to play it with. I love it's fast paced combat and especially the fact that EVERYONE has an awesome jetpack to use. I love the class based combat that gives me fond memories of tf2 but with a more refined and polished feeling. I encourage everyone to buy this game even if you have to wait for a steam sale to get it.

I play it too and currently have no body to play it with since pirate bailed :).
But dont they have only one map, the dessert?
Oh and its FTP :P
This is old. And when I bought it it was not FTP
